data.name: Land of the Mage Lords
data.detailed_description:
Survive waves of enemy troops and spells while summoning your own to do battle.

Multiple Ways to Win

In this defense-style game, progress through ten unique levels. Earn more powerful abilities as you conquer each enemy. Access more than fifty spells and troops. Cast anything from a Storm of Lightning to Healing Spells. Summon troops that range from tiny Will O Wisps through Elven Archers to Vampires.

Features

  • 50+ spells and troops
  • 10 unique levels
  • 3 difficulty levels
data.about_the_game:
Survive waves of enemy troops and spells while summoning your own to do battle.

Multiple Ways to Win

In this defense-style game, progress through ten unique levels. Earn more powerful abilities as you conquer each enemy. Access more than fifty spells and troops. Cast anything from a Storm of Lightning to Healing Spells. Summon troops that range from tiny Will O Wisps through Elven Archers to Vampires.

Features

  • 50+ spells and troops
  • 10 unique levels
  • 3 difficulty levels
data.short_description: Summon troops and use magic to defeat mage lords and other foes while surviving attacks from their followers. Learn new spells and recruit troops with unique powers. Venture across the land, battling ever stronger enemies until reaching the evil Mage King.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
